ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] From a magician list. A little more info
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all,  Calador here again, I also reviewed a log file from the event, and me and Jorus just discussed it, and the person who mentioned the firewater was not
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,  Calador here again, I also reviewed a log file from the event, and me and Jorus just discussed it, and the person who mentioned the firewater was not one of the gnome participants, as the log was recording their last names, but did not record this persons.  I tell you, there can be some real jerks at these events, which makes it hard to sift through everything.  I just wanted to tell you all for sure, that no firewater was involved.  The log does not record loot messages, so I'll have to check with Ursoo tonight to find out the exact name of the "Metal Parts" he said he took.  Again, I'll let you know what I find out.
-----Original Message-----
From: Cory Burns [mailto:coryb@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 20, 2000 1:58 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] From a magician list. A little more info

I don't know if anyone has replied to my first email, my incoming
mail has been sitting in it's queue for about 5 hours.  Hmm.  Well
anyways, I was running through the log files for the quest and one of
the gnomes also mentions needing firewater.  I overlooked it the
first time because of the 80 other people there 'saying' messages
constantly.  But, we did not see any firewater on the actual corpse
of the Personal Heater.

Jorus Ter'Xion
Tarew Marr
 
 
 
"Fanrick Tinker/Mage Tarew Marr
-----Original Message-----
From: Joe D [mailto:joed@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 20, 2000 10:50 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] From a magician list.

On Thu, Apr 20, 2000 at 09:06:08AM -0500, Cory Burns wrote:

> [Wed Apr 19 20:11:58 2000] Calador tells the group, 'wiz spell,
> inferno shock'
> [Wed Apr 19 20:12:07 2000] Calador tells the group, 'metal twine'
> [Wed Apr 19 20:12:11 2000] Calador tells the group, 'metal rod'
> [Wed Apr 19 20:12:22 2000] Calador tells the group, 'and gizmo #6'
> [Wed Apr 19 20:14:07 2000] Ursoo tells the guild, 'gears, amber,
> large lantern, metal parts'
>
> Now the gnomes argued over the fact that they 'should have' used
> gizmo #4 to keep the item from being dangerous.  Plus, I think Ursoo
> was refering to metal bits, not metal parts.. but I dont know for
> sure, since Dark Elves don't meddle much into tinkering.

Hmmm.  Could be gnomish bolts, since they look like metal bits.  This could
be an interesting thing to try.

Pasketti, Povar
